Metadata: Is basic research on salmon endocrinology relevant to improving the fishery?
"Proceedings of the 1990 Northeast Pacific Chinook and Coho Salmon Workshop," Thomas J. Hassler, ed., pp. 234-236, Arcata, California, September 18-22, 1990.

The answer to the question, posed in the title, 'Is basic research on salmon endocrinology relevant to improving the fishery?,' is a resounding 'yes.' This brief commentary aims at giving some examples of the nature of the contribution, actual and potential, of basic neuroendocrinolâ€‹ogical research to salmon hatchery practice and aquaculture.
